Name: Sherma
Effect: Resolve: Give Friendly Units 6 Protection. Ability 2 (Caretake): Retreat a friendly unit.
Lore: Ho there, traveller. I'm afraid there's only me left to offer welcome. Our town's fallen quiet you see.

Name: Flick the Fixer
Effect: Ability 2 (Fix It). Spend 20. Friendly Units gain 2 Permanent Protection and 2 Permanent Imbue.
Lore: Aye, aye. You're a sharp bug! A wishwall. It's past time this old camp had one. As the resident fixer, I've taken it upon myself to sort it out.

Name: Shakra
Effect: Strike: Apply Melee Weakness 1 and Advance.
Lore: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keeen! In my land, that is the way warriors great each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.

Name: Pebb
Effect: Ability 5 (Wormway Key): Spend 500 gold. Gain an Artifact that increases Max Silk by 4. Harvest: Gain 5 gold.
Lore: O-oh! Traveller! Won't you stop and make trade with an old pilgrim? Surely something here will aid you in your great journey!

Name: Grindle
Effect: Ability 2 (Retreat): Retreat. Strike: Gain 10 gold.
Lore: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poir little snitchbug like Grindle.

Name: Fleamaster Mooshka
Effect: Resolve: Add a random Flea to Hand
Lore: The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.

Name: Grishkin
Effect: Combo Flea: Shift: Fleas get +1/+1
Lore: My fellows give much worry for the other fleas, but I'm not give at all. They will find their way to us, and if not, who keep count of them anyway? Har har!

Name: Varga
Effect: Combo Fleamaster Mooshka: Rally: Reduce all Friendly Unit Cooldowns by 1. Ability 4 (Wrangle): Channel 2 Silk. Add a random Flea to Hand.
Lore: The Fleamaster though, is always want to move on. We will be drag away somewhere much worse soon, I think.

Name: Pavo
Effect: Silksong: Gain Conduit 6
Lore: most of our residents did not fare so well... Still, it's no good to dwell on dark things! We shall build, and grow, and welcome! As is any good bellbug's task.

Name: Gilly
Effect: Silksong: Gain Stealth 2.
Lore: Upon the last wish of my father, I've taken up the study of these wild caves. These fields still display life and growth, even as the lands around erode to dust.

Name: Ballow
Effect: Equipped: Give Friendly Units 7 Imbue.
Lore: Holler when you're ready, miss. The upgrades are done. That bell's ready as it'll ever be.

Name: Twelfth Architect
Effect: Celebrate: Spend 100 Gold. Gain an Artifact: Units gain Valor 1 on move.
Lore: Do you ask-need our service? We shall create, as is our d-d-directive. To serve, for Pharloom eternal.

Name: Lumble the Lucky
Effect: Incant: Gain 5 gold. Extinguish: Units get Permanent Protection 3.
Lore: care to test your luck with a game of dice?

Name: Alchemist Zylotol
Effect: Ability 2 (Inject): Channel 2 Silk. Apply Damage Shield 2 and Permanent Imbue 5 to a friendly unit.
Lore: The Plasmium, our great research... We have progressed.

Name: Garamond
Effect: Combo Zaza: Gain +10/+10 permanently and Ability 2 (Lance): Attack.
Lore: Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip!

Name: Green Prince
Effect: Silksong: Add an Ephemeral Copy with Fragile to your hand.
Lore: The myth we made... by grace... by blade... All bowed before we princes green...

Name: Vog
Effect: Harvest: If a Flea Died
Type: Add a random Flea to Hand.
Lore: Caravan? Grrr. Felt it in my fur... Time for change. If caravan is close, then my task, these lands, may near be complete.
Notes: A flea that can summon more fleas when others fall in battle.

Name: Yarnaby
Effect: Combo Crull and Benjin: Hunger: Front friendly unit gets Lifesteal 1. Strike: Add a random uncommon or rare Morsel to Hand.
Lore: Bzzt! Bravo! A specimen who sees my brilliance!

Name: Sprintmaster Swift
Effect: Resolve: Reduce all Friendly Unit Cooldowns by 1.
Lore: So this is... defeat? Can it be? Huu... A shell so fast! Wonder of Pharloom!

Name: Chapel Maid
Effect: Combo Snail: Apply Duality. Silksong: Friendly Units get 3 Permanent Protection.
Lore: Up with you! Up! I won't have you dying on my floor!

Name: Pinmaster Plinney
Effect: Ability 5 (Sharpen): Spend 30 gold. Give a friendly unit 8 Permanent Imbue.
Lore: Bonva! What wonder? What wish? To steal a gift so fine. Few are the pinmasters of our age that ever worked with such a substance.

Name: Seamstress
Effect: Combo Pinstress: Gain Conduit 16
Lore: Good, good! The caves just beyond here are full of the creatures, floating carelessly in the warm air.

Name: Pinstress
Effect: Combo Pinstress: Strike: Gain Conduit 2
Lore: The black quakes... Pharloom's finale arrives. So let's stop the yapping, aye! How's 'bout we begin?

Name: Bell Hermit
Effect: Combo Snail: Apply Duality. Silksong: Friendly Units get 3 Permanent Imbue.
Lore: Hnff... So the slave comes seeking? I've heard it. Wishing on a world cut free, yes? Along with my nephew up there. Sounds he's sunk as simple as you.

Name: Relic Seeker Scrounge
Effect: Equipped: Remove the Equipment. Gain 20 gold. Silksong: Gain 20 gold.
Lore: What? What, what? Who is it? What've you got? What do you want?

Name: Zaza
Effect: Combo Garamond: Gain Ability (Humble Steed): Add a random Equipment to Hand.
Lore: The beast has been spotted! Once Zaza has fully rested, we'll set to tracking it down!

Name: Caretaker
Effect: Combo Snail: Apply Duality. Ability 2 (Guidance): Channel 2 Silk. Apply Damage Shield 1 to a friendly unit.
Lore: Remarkable idea you're speakin' there, bellringer, a world cut free. Not a wish I've had much cause to hope one, serious like... but I ain't so surprised to hear you speak it.

Name: Kratt
Effect: Ability 1 (Send to Hot Spring): Sacrifice a Flea. Gain 2 Silk. Fleas get +5/+5 and Damage Shield 1
Lore: Poor little Kratt did not mean to steal a look! This old carriage needs constant care. I was only doing repairs! I had no intent to intrude! And I barely saw a thing!

Name: Crull and Benjin
Effect: Ability 2 (Feast): Add 2 random uncommon or rare Morsels to Hand. Combo Yarnaby: Hunger: +3/+3.
Lore: Us moorbugs gotta eat, don't we?

Name: Nuu
Effect: Harvest: Add an uncommon or rare Morsel to Hand. Hunger: Gain 2 Permanent Imbue and 2 Permanent Protection
Lore: Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!
